articles.title: Alabama basketball reaches highest AP poll ranking since 2006 - AL.com
articles.description: Alabama's win over top-ranked Houston on Saturday propelled the Tide toward the top of the polls.
articles.content:
Alabama jumped four spots in Mondays Associated Press mens basketball poll to No. 4, its highest ranking in that poll since Dec. 4, 2006.
The Tide defeated previously No. 1-ranked Houston on Saturda… [+2007 chars]
